reviews.review: 이건 진짜 해봐야 함.
Best game EVER!

If you liked Portal 1 - and let's face it, who didn't? - then you need Portal 2 in your life. More portals, more puzzles (still no cake) and a far richer storyline that will change your opinion on potatoes forever!
Coop is worth the cost
Amazing game.
This game is great. Wish it was longer, but custom maps are fun, too.
Fun co-op game.  But not for the price of $49.99.  Get it on sale.
Portal was one of the most intelligent and interesting games ever, and Portal 2 is a worthy successor, improving in so many ways.
Jogo do ano!
You should buy this. Why? Because if you don't, I'll use the lemons on your house. You want to know what I'm talking about? Play the game and find out.

Como o primeiro, divertido, diferente...
O tema é o mesmo, mas com outros elementos, o jogo tambem esta muito maior que o primeiro, e tem co-op...
Jogo perfeito pra quem gosta de puzzles que não geram dores de cabeça, fora a engenharia ja conhecida e interessante...

If Aperature Science built their lab that far under the Earth the would half to contend with two serious problems: heat from the mantle and mole men. Seeing as how Chell does not instantly burst into flames when the game starts and that she is not constantly harassed by trogledytes I am of the opinion that the entire game does infact take place in an alternate reality where Earth's core has been replaced with an enormous quantity of sea monsters.
How good is this game! Just get it you big nancy. We can be partners. In science.
great game
aaaah, toujours aussi bon ce jeu  :)
Cool beans
It's cool, and by recommending it I get free stuff :p

I love portals! This game is definately worth what you end up paying for it. It is addicting enough to binge it and beat it all, but intuitive enough to go back and mess around with here and there... Hoping for user content to become more readily available for the portal games eventually.

Edit: This game is great. It doesn't take a long time, but is well worth the $20 to support this style of game development. It isn't being milked with DLCs and it offers a great co op experience. It is clever, funny, and at challenging enough the first time through that it isn't boring, yet not frustratingly difficult. If for whatever reason you don't pay full price for games, or can't afford to pay full retail for this game, that is ok. It goes on sale almost every seasonal steam sale.
The best single-player game out there right now if you've played and completed Portal 1. Get it while the gettin's good.

Still great after all these years...

Buy this game, or I will eat my own fist in rage!
Great Game. 3x longer than the original Portal(Single Player Alone). Great Co-Op mode with fun and challenging puzzles.
Have Fun wth Portals :D
Gotta love it. Nice storyline and wonderful Co-Op.
Gran historia y cargada de mala leche electronica.
Grande jogo!
Absolutely awesome game, picks up well from the first, and introduces a lot of new gameplay elements.

Amazing game play, awesome graphics, and an unforgettable story make this one of the funniest and somewhat challenging games of all time. I should say that everyone should own this game if not for the portal series, but for its constant jokes. You will not regret this purchase. I guarantee it. Cave Johnson, we’re done here…
Best Game EVVVAAAA must own itttttt!!!
unpackbar lustig!

I know some of the levels get ridiculously hard; but this is the most hilarious arcade-like game I've ever played.  You should probably play Portal One first just so that you will appreciate Portal 2 even more.  I was able to beat Portal One almost easily.  ;)  So most of you should, too.  Arcade and puzzle-style game.

This game is amazing.
It's packed with action, humor, and tons of mind-bending, physics defying, creative puzzles.
This game has great replay value and will have you coming back, again and again, for more.
GR8 GAME I BEET SP IN 8 STR8 HRS W/O LEAVIN MY COMP TRU STORY

A great sequal to Portal - if you liked that you will love this. I recommend playing Portal or at least the demo of Portal (Portal: First Slice) first to get the most enjoyment out of this.

A great return to Apeture Science

Im making a note here
HUGE SUCCESS

Portal 2 just takes the puzzle solving fun and ridiculous humour of Portal, and kicks it up a notch. It's longer, and more involved, and now you can even play with your friends! The puzzles are sufficiently tricky to be rewarding, but not nearly tricky enough to scare away all but the die-hard puzzle game enthusiasts. I have a hard time imagining anyone who would not enjoy playing this game.
geile sache
In 6 Stunden durchgezockt... geiles Game aber Preis/Leistung ist ... fragwürdig solange man keine Mitspieler im Multiplayer-Modus hat

epic game!

Mehr muss man nicht sagen. ....
Really nice game!

What seemed like a highly successful experiment Portal 1 was, Valve decided to raise the bar once again by delivering a full fledged sequel. The highly anticipated game exceeded even the highest expectations I had and it's by far, the best game I ever played. While Portal 1 was more gameplay oriented, in this game you'll find that the storyline plays a more significant role. The cinematic effects, new gameplay techniques, excellent music, unpredictable plot twists and of course, GlaDOS's dark humor give Portal 2 a very special atmosphere, unlike in any other game I ever played. I'm not even talking about the amazing cooperative mode with free DLCs to come. An absolute must-have for sure.

Portalをプレイしたことがあるなら迷わず2も買え
Portalをプレイしたことがないなら一緒に買え
Awesome Game and is worth the money!!!!
I really enjoyed this game and have played through it a couple times.  It's just as good as the first if not better.
Simply..... AWESOME!!!
Jogo único. Sensacional. A must buy.
When the only bad thing about a game is that you want more of it, it can't really be too bad of a thing overall. Oh and Cave Johnson quotes are worth it by themselves.
It is portal 2!
What can i say: its fun, its funny, its addictive... play it!
This game is SO MUCH FUN. I recommend playing it while listening to smooth jazz.
Portal is awesome, yay.
Portal 2 is an incredible synthesis of sublimely witty humor and thought-provoking gameplay and one that makes for an enthralling single-player campaign and superb co-op challenges.

This is a game that everyone can play, that everyone can enjoy. Portal 2 follows its legacy, only now you can experience the full might of it, and with your friends in co-op.
I understand that some people can be deceived, but its really the only game I've played that has really surprised me (besides the Half-Life series and the first Portal, which you should get too). VALVe said it and VALVe did it again: when we thought we had all the fun we could get, they managed to surprise us once more.
The Ultimate puzzle game but with an awesome plot so twice as good
There is no word to describe how awesome this game is.
This game is just incredible

More epic in scale than the original Portal with more of a story. I felt the original Portal was a bit more challenging. But all the things that make Valve games great are present here. Co-op mode in particular is fresh and new. Highly recommended.
Hilarious and fun puzzle gaming action. Not terribly long, but when coupled with the co-op levels that helps. Best game I have played this year. $45 well spent.
I didn't think Valve could top Portal. I was wrong.  Get this now!
Una compra obligada, otra joya de Valve!
Awesome game, worth every penny.

Jogaço. Achei que não ia dar pra ser melhor que o primeiro, mas os novos personagens são muito bons, e o jogo é bem longo comparado com o primeiro. Os puzzles são mais simples e mais complexos ao mesmo tempo, porque envolvem mais elementos, mas eliminou o timing preciso do primeiro. Ou seja, você não tem que ficar atento pra atirar tão depressa pra fazer um double fling.

I am obsessed with this franchise, the Portal games are amazing, and this one blows the first one far out of the water, now I just gotta convince my buddy Perry that we need to finish co-op... Also, I want a plushy companion cube and GlaDOS Potato... birthday preasant any one? Seriously though, this is one of the best games ever created.
Does it even need saying why this game is awesome?!
This is an amazing game. If you haven't played then get it now, or if you haven't finished it then hurry up since the ending is awesomely funny.

You have to play this game. It's more experience than game with an interesting story, great gameplay, and even better co-op. Me and a buddy played through the co-op experience together and we both put in on record as one of the coolest, stressful, and rewarding stuff seen in some time. Future DLCs for co-op will keep this game replayable for a long, long time. If you haven't played Portal2 yet, do it. It's worth the full price of admission.
i recommed this game
I simply can not stress enough the importance of your participance in this Aperture Science Enrichment Testing
One of the best games I've ever played. In every way the sequel I was waiting for as a Portal fan. For SCIENCE!

Sehr geiles Spiel, um längen besser als Portal 1. Wer den ersten Teil mochte wird den hier abgrund tief lieben. Alle Nase lang Sarkassmus / lustige Sprüche. Und die neuen Möglichkeiten zum lösen der Aufgaben sind auch genial!
I totally recommend this game.

Definitivamente o melhor jogo do ano. Fiquei com receio quando joguei o primeiro Portal, mas depois que comecei não consegui mais largar. Logo fiquei ansioso pela continuação e, quando lançou o segundo título, terminei no primeiro dia. Portal 2 supera o primeiro em todos os sentidos, principalmente na facilidade de fazer o jogador rir muto. GlaDOS é genial.
Una secuela muy digna que volverá a engancharte durante muchas horas.
Amazing.
Best game ever.
Why havent you bought this game already?
ce faire plaisir
Polecam, Żanet Kaleta.
Que du Fun o/
I love jumping through random holes, drains, ect so this game is a dream come true. YOU MAKE YOUR OWN (without needing a spade)  you may like it to.
"I just want you gone" <3
Most addictive and utterly engrossing game I have played in a long, long time!

A worthy sequel to Portal, this 3D puzzle game takes all the fun of Portal and expands it to add even more ways to navigate the test chambers.  Keep an eye on Wheatley though, I don't think he's quite sane...

Amazing. Best puzzle/strategy ever. VALVe calls Portal 2 an action, which is appropriate because the game is more than just "go into this test and don't die, then do the same in the next". There's actually an intricate storyline behind it.
très bon jeux niveau technique, facile a joue,niveau stratégie assez suffisant,que du bonheur il faut essayer ;) !

Just might be my favorite Valve game of all time. Great atmosphere, harder puzzles than the first Portal, and JK Simmons as Aperture CEO Cave Johnson is pitch-perfect. Worth every penny. 

(9/10)
Excellent puzzles, great narrative pulled along by wonderful voice acting by Mr Merchant and Mr Simmons.  Get this game and let life give you lemons.
Longer and more addictive than the original... get it.
Single player is amazing. Co-op is amazing (playing with friends makes it a lot easier). Best game I've played this year.
Great game. Great soundtrack. Great story. PLAY IT.

Amazing single player campaign, hilarious dialogue (or monologue), epic mutliplayer design, awesome background music and end credits (Goodbye my only friend. - Oh, did you think I meant you? That would be funny if it weren't so sad...), and of course, you can't forget "AHHH BIRD BIRD BIRD BIRD!"

BUY IT. This game is worth every penny.
This is brilliant, did valve proud :)
This explores the lore of Portal and Aperture so much more in depth than it did in the first one. Not only that, the puzzles are more challenging and there are plenty of twists within, as well!
Simplemente... LA PUTA OSTIA
The most fun in a game anyone can have.
Great Game!

This is a very additive puzzle adventure game. I had so much fun with this game both story wise and gameplay wise. This has really fun multiplayer as well as steam workshop mods which greatly extends the life of this game. If you have not played the first portal game, I would totally recommend picking up the first one as well as this one. This game is a classic!
What are you waiting for? Unless you have bought it allready, then this might not make sence..

Portal 2 surpasses Portal 1 in all ways. Longer story, Co-op, Mann Co. Store, PS3 Steam Cloud, and enough mind- warping puzzles to melt the minds of simpltons. A must have for people who love having fun.
This game is AWESOME! Seriously, get it. Be sure to play Portal 1 first though.
Just the best game ever!!
